name: Kozuki Momonosuke
text: [Activate: Main] â‘  (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) you may rest this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Wano Country} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
